dragHandleLabel: press space to select and keys to drag

pageNumberNotFound.heading: Page Number Not Found
pageNumberNotFound.message: The page number you requested does not exist. Please try a different page number.

metadataTip.title: Metadata Tip
metadataTip.content: After adding the dataset, click the Edit Dataset button to add more metadata.

validationAlert.title: Validation Error
validationAlert.content: Required fields were missed or there was a validation error. Please scroll down to see details.

datasetMetadataForm.mayBecomeRequired: One or more of these fields may become required if you add to one or more of these optional fields.

invalid.date: {{displayName}} is not a valid date. Please use the format {{dateFormat}}

hostCollection.label: Host Collection
hostCollection.description: The collection which contains this data.

name.label: Collection Name
name.description: The project, department, university, professor, or journal this collection will contain data for.

invalid.maxLength: Collection Name must be at most {{maxLength}} characters.

affiliation.label: Affiliation
affiliation.description: The organization with which this collection is affiliated.

invalid.maxLength: Affiliation must be at most {{maxLength}} characters.

alias.label: Identifier
alias.description: Short name used for the URL of this collection.

invalid.format: Identifier is not valid. Valid characters are a-Z, 0-9, '_', and '-'.
invalid.numberOnly: Identifier should not be numeric only.
invalid.maxLength: Identifier must be at most {{maxLength}} characters.

storage.label: Storage
storage.description: A storage service to be used for datasets in this collection.

type.label: Category
type.description: The type that most closely reflects this collection.

description.label: Description
description.description: A summary describing the purpose, nature or scope of this collection.
description.subLabel: This field supports only certain <htmlTooltip>HTML tags</htmlTooltip>.

contacts.label: Email
contacts.description: The email address(es) of the contact(s) for the collection.
contacts.invalid: Email is not a valid email

metadataFields.helperText: Choose the metadata fields to use in dataset templates and when adding a dataset to this collection.

browseSearchFacets.label: Browse/Search Facets
browseSearchFacets.helperText: Choose and order the metadata fields to use as facets when browsing this collection.

invalid.minLength: At least one facet must be selected.

confirmResetModal.title: Reset Modifications
confirmResetModal.warning: Are you sure you want to reset the selected metadata fields? If you do this, any customizations (hidden, required, optional) you have done will no longer appear.

invalid.duplicateCombination: File Name, File Path or combination of File path + File name should be unique.
invalid.maxLength: File Name must be at most {{maxLength}} characters.
invalid.characters: The file name contains invalid characters. The following characters are not allowed: : < > ; # / " * | ? \

filePath.label: File Path
filePath.description: Hierarchical directory structure path used to display file organization and support reproducibility.

invalid.duplicateCombination: File Name, File Path or combination of File path + File name should be unique.
invalid.maxLength: File Path must be at most {{maxLength}} characters.
invalid.characters: The file path contains invalid characters. Only letters, numbers, spaces, dashes, periods, backslashes, and forward slashes are allowed.

invalid.maxLength: Description must be at most {{maxLength}} characters.

fileUploader.supportedFiles: All file types are supported for upload and download in their original format. If you are uploading Excel, CSV, TSV, RData, Stata, or SPSS files, <anchor>see the guides</anchor> for tabular support and limitations.
fileUploader.accordionTitle: Upload with HTTP via your browser
fileUploader.dragDropMultiple: Drag and drop files and/or directories here.
fileUploader.uploadFailed: There was an error uploading this file.
fileUploader.replaceFileMultipleError: You can only drop one file to replace.
fileUploader.replaceFileAlreadyOneFileError: You already have a file to replace. Please remove it first.
fileUploader.fileReplacedSuccessfully: The file has been replaced successfully.
fileUploader.defaultFileReplaceError: Something went wrong replacing the file. Try again later.
fileUploader.defaultAddUploadedFilesToDatasetError: Something went wrong adding the uploaded files to the dataset. Try again later.

fileUploadSkipped.dsStore: File upload skipped: .DS_Store files are not allowed.
fileUploadSkipped.alreadyUploaded: File {{fileName}} was skipped because it has already been uploaded.

fileTypeDifferentModal.title: File Type Different
fileTypeDifferentModal.message: The original file ({{originalFileType}}) and replacement file ({{replacementFileType}}) are different file types. Would you like to continue?

confirmLeaveModal.title: Discard Uploaded Files?
confirmLeaveModal.message: Uploaded files haven’t been saved. If you leave now, they’ll be lost.

contact.subject: Subject
contact.helpText: Email the contact for this collection.
contact.verificationText: Please fill this out to prove you are not a robot.
contact.defaultFeedbackSubmitError: An error occurred while submitting your feedback. Please try again later.
